fn.p: This project was supported by the European Community Framework Programme 7, Atopica® (Atopic diseases in changing climate, land use and air quality), grant agreement no. 282687. I.R.L. is funded in part by the National Institute for Health Research, Health Protection Research Unit in Emergency Preparedness and Response at King’s College London. The research presented in this paper was carried out on the High Performance Computing Cluster supported by the Research and Specialist Computing Support service at the University of East Anglia.
The authors declare they have no actual or potential competing financial interests.
